thread.title: Photographer creates dramatic yet surreal action figure dioramas (28 Photos)
thread.title_full: Photographer creates dramatic yet surreal action figure dioramas (28 Photos)

author: Matt
title: Photographer creates dramatic yet surreal action figure dioramas (28 Photos)
text:
Hot.kenobi 
From the sublime to the humorously ridiculous, Japanese photographer Hot.kenobi creates supremely affecting action scenes using action figures from pop culture history. 
So whether it is Iron Man trying to catch Pikachu or Deadpool being drowned in a water bottle, the Osaka-based visualist has a little something, not to mention a little humor, for everyone. 
Check out his Instagram here 2
